activation.ReallyYourEmail: Ingabe leli ikheli lakho le-imeyili ngempela, {{1}}? Uma kunjalo, chofoza lapha ukuze usethe umushwana wakho wokungena futhi wenze i-akhawunti yakho isebenze.

LinkToUnsubscribe: Nasi isixhumanisi sokuzikhipha ohlwini uma ungafuni ukuthola amanye ama-imeyili.

charge.HasBeenCharged: Sawubona, lokhu okokukwazisa nje ukuthi {{1}} ukhokhisiwe {{2}} okungu-{{3}} ngo-{{4}}

charged.HavePaid: Sawubona {{1}}, lesi isiqinisekiso esisheshayo sokuthi ukhokhe ngempumelelo {{3}} ku-{{3}} {{4}}

resend.YouAreReceiving: Uthola le imeyili ngenxa yokuthi othile ufake ikheli lakho le-imeyili wabe esechofoza "ukhohlwe umushwana wokungena". Uma bekungewena, vele uzibe lo mlayezo.
resend.Reset: Ukuze usethe kabusha umushwana wakho wokungena, chofoza {{1}}

subscription.YouHaveStarted: Sawubona {{1}}, uqale ukubhalisa kwakho ku-{{2}} nge-{{3}} ngo-{{4}} {{5}} izinyanga.
subscription.HasStarted: Lokhu okokukwazisa nje ukuthi {{1}}, sebeqale ukubhalisa kwabo ku-{{2}} nge-{{3}} ngo-{{4}} {{5}} izinyanga.
